forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain this morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending this morning. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low near 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low near 35F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 41F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 36F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 42F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening changing to snow showers overnight. Low near 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening changing to snow showers overnight. Low 33F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening. A snow shower or two late - otherwise, mostly cloudy. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening. A few snow showers late - otherwise, mostly cloudy. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 30%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
